parameters.name: beta

param_schema.title: Beta
param_schema.description: Only used for long text inputs or in case of reference speaker,             determines the prosody of the speaker. Use lower values to sample style based             on previous or reference speech instead of text.

parameters.description: Only used for long text inputs or in case of reference speaker,             determines the prosody of the speaker. Use lower values to sample style based             on previous or reference speech instead of text.

parameters.name: alpha

param_schema.title: Alpha
param_schema.description: Only used for long text inputs or in case of reference speaker,             determines the timbre of the speaker. Use lower values to sample style based             on previous or reference speech instead of text.

parameters.description: Only used for long text inputs or in case of reference speaker,             determines the timbre of the speaker. Use lower values to sample style based             on previous or reference speech instead of text.

parameters.name: weights

param_schema.title: Weights
param_schema.description: Replicate weights url for inference with model that is fine-tuned on new speakers.            If provided, a reference speech must also be provided.             If not provided, the default model will be used.

parameters.description: Replicate weights url for inference with model that is fine-tuned on new speakers.            If provided, a reference speech must also be provided.             If not provided, the default model will be used.

parameters.name: reference

param_schema.title: Reference
param_schema.description: Reference speech to copy style from

parameters.description: Reference speech to copy style from

parameters.name: embedding_scale

param_schema.title: Embedding Scale
param_schema.description: Embedding scale, use higher values for pronounced emotion

parameters.description: Embedding scale, use higher values for pronounced emotion
